to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "iTerm2"' -e 'repeat with w in windows' -e 'tell w' -e 'if NAME of w starts with "1. " then' -e 'set index to 1' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "iTerm2"' -e 'perform action "AXRaise" of window 1' -e 'set frontmost to true' -e 'end tell' -e 'return' -e 'end if' -e 'end tell' -e 'end repeat' -e 'end tell'
